title: Dragonslayer: The Legend of Erich Ludendorff in the Weimar Republic and Third Reich
description: "This book demonstrates how Erich Ludendorff became the embodiment of Germans' fantasies of revenge for the defeat in World War I. Ludendorff's self-constructed legend and postwar activities provide new insights into the political cultures of the Weimar Republic and the Third Reich"--
author: Jay Lockenour
